basics.name: MAI CHI BAO
basics.summary: Currently employed at Nam A Bank as Senior Machine Learning Engineer and Data Science Team Leader.

work.position: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Data Science Team Leader
work.summary: Fine-tuned Vision LLM (Qwen2VL) for golf scorecard extraction, achieving 83% higher accuracy than traditional OCR with 30 samples. Developed RAG-based chatbot with LLM, reducing latency and cost by up to 100x. Building facial recognition system with anti-spoofing for 1.8M+ customers. Led customer churn prediction with LightGBM, achieving over 78% accuracy on 28.5% of customers. Keynote Speaker at International Conference on Economics 2023 on Big Data.
Researched Point Set Registration with Deep Learning approaches. Compared Graph-based, Convolutional-based, and Pointwise MLP methods.
highlights: Developed a novel Point Set Registration algorithm using Deep Learning, achieving state-of-the-art results on benchmark datasets.
Implemented a robust evaluation framework to compare different registration methods, leading to significant improvements in accuracy and efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate the algorithm into existing systems, enhancing overall performance and user experience.

portfolio.name: Multilanguage Invoice OCR
portfolio.description: Optimized invoice extraction for a German company using Vision LLM (Qwen2VL) and OpenAI. Developed and deployed full-stack AI application (Python, ReactJS, MongoDB) on AWS with Docker. Automated processes with DevOps/MLOps.

portfolio.name: Telegram Bot Assistant
portfolio.description: Developed bot for stock-related tasks, document Q&A using Langchain, LLMs, and RAG. Integrated voice-to-task functionality with Whisper and Microsoft To Do.

portfolio.name: Automated Scoring of Handwritten Test Papers
portfolio.description: Used OpenCV for image preprocessing, reducing processing time by 50%. Implemented CRNN-CTC Loss Model with Attention and Lexicon Search, achieving 95.55% accuracy on 245 students.
